usecases.title: Use Cases
usecases.subtitle: Real-world applications of the iThing platform across industries.

items.title: 5-Star Hotel Chain — Room Automation
items.desc: 300-room hotel deployed iHotel across all floors. Energy bills reduced by 38%, guest service response time cut from 12 minutes to under 2 minutes via in-room SOS and digital MUR requests.

items.title: Shopping Mall — Centralised Building Control
items.desc: A regional mall with 180,000 sqm deployed iBMS for HVAC, lighting, and access. Achieved 31% reduction in energy spend and cut facility management headcount needed by 40%.
items.result: 31% energy reduction · 40% fewer FM staff needed

items.title: Food Processing Plant — Predictive Maintenance
items.desc: Manufacturer deployed vibration and temperature sensors on 120 production machines. iFactory predicted 14 failures over 6 months before they occurred, saving an estimated SAR 2.4M in unplanned downtime.

items.title: Desert Farm — Precision Irrigation
items.desc: A 500-hectare farm in the Eastern Province installed soil sensors and automated drip irrigation. Water consumption dropped 43% while tomato yield improved 27% in the first season.

items.title: Pharmaceutical Cold Chain — Temperature Monitoring
items.desc: Distributor tracks 800 active shipments daily. Temperature breaches detected in real time, reducing product loss by 91%. Full cold chain traceability provided for regulatory reporting.

items.title: Private Hospital — Medical Asset Tracking
items.desc: 280-bed hospital deployed RTLS for 1,200 tagged assets. Average equipment search time dropped from 22 minutes to under 90 seconds, recovering 4+ hours of nurse time per shift.
